page.title: 08Sport and Recreation
page.content: Sport facilities are provided in the form of playing fields, bowling and putting greens and a cricket pitch. Hall accomdation exists in the area where carpet bowling and badminton take place in the winter evenings. There is also an indoor rifle range. A small pool at the Caravan Site allows swimming during the summer. At both playing fields there is equipment for children and the area abounds with country walks,many through areas of high scenic value. Most sports are part of organised associations which operate in the local district. Many of the inhabitants make use of more specialised facilities,such as golf courses,close at hand. { }Recently{FOCHABERS JUNIOR FOOTBALL {CLUB}has been formed hopefully to bring the name of the village fame.
